attributes.action: Give small businesses more protection from getting kicked out for more money.
attributes.additional_details: On August 2021 i took a huge step,  I left my job and rented a commercial unit in my local town centre. By February 2022 i was moving into a bigger unit as it was going so well. Now sadly someone much bigger has offered more money for my unit and i have simply been handed my notice with no care for what i have put in. I have lost alot financially and emotionally due to spending alot doing this unit up and having worked 7 days a week to grow.
attributes.background: I would like them to help small businesses have more saftey and protection against being kicked out of commercial premises for the landlord to get more money.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your experience, but petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you the Government to make it more difficult for landlords to end leases for small businesses, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like the Government to make to legislation governing commercial leases.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
